page.title: 15Homelife in Mowsley.
page.content: Most people wake at 7.00 in the week and later at weekends{.Breakfast}is usually cereals and toast.In most houses Dad goes to work first.Most Mums go to work too. Most children have a packed lunch at school and a cooked meal at night with the family .{Sunday dinner}is eaten at midday and is roast meat,vegetables and pudding.The favourite meat is chicken,the favourite pudding is trifle. After the evening meal people watch television,the most popular programme is Dallas.Some Dads also read newspapers or go to the pub.Adults go to bed between 11.00 and 1.00,children earlier,though at weekends they go when they like. { Pocket Money}is between 50p and Â£1; any more can be earned by doing jobs in the house and garden.
